1.3.5.name: wordpress/wp-markitup
1.3.5.description: WP MarkItUp! is the Wordpress plugin that replaces the old "quicktags" toolbar with MarkItUp!, a lightweight jQuery plugin that allows to turn any textarea into an highly customizable markup editor. XHTML, Textile, Wiki, Markdown and BBcode toolbars are already provided out-of-the-box, but even your own markup syntax can be easily implemented with this system. The plugin currently features three different skins for the toolbar, new ones are about to come.
